channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: « Une erreur s’est produite » : X anciennement Twitter est en panne
item.description: Le réseau social X affiche un message d'erreur. De nombreux internautes signalent une panne

item.title: Meilleures chaises gamer : quel fauteuil de gaming choisir en 2026 ?
item.description: Avoir une bonne chaise gaming est indispensable quand on passe des heures devant son PC gaming. Voici nos recommandations des meilleurs fauteuils gamer que nous avons pu tester, pour jouer dans des conditions optimales.

item.title: 'We held off for as long as we could': Framework gives stark warning about 'years' of RAM misery as it hikes prices on desktop PC
item.description: If you wanted some better news about the ongoing RAM pricing crisis, you won't find it here.

item.title: Mais c’est quoi ce SUV Renault Filante ? Une base chinoise, une production coréenne et un logo français
item.description: Regardez bien les photos, car vous ne la croiserez probablement jamais sur l'A6. La Renault Filante est officielle. Sous ses airs de "super Rafale", ce SUV de segment E cache une réalité industrielle implacable : une plateforme Geely, une usine à Busan et une stratégie qui ignore délibérément l'Europe de l'Ouest.

item.title: ExpressVPN just dropped a huge MacOS update — here's the 5 things I'm most excited about
item.description: Split tunneling is the headline, but there's much more to look out for

item.title: Prix des PC portables : l’astuce radicale de HP pour limiter la hausse des tarifs
item.description: Alors que HP réfléchirait à intégrer de la mémoire DRAM chinoise à certains de ses PC portables, la Chine se place en véritable alternative pour compenser la crise que traverse le marché cette année.

item.title: Mises à jour Xiaomi : Orange cède enfin, l’opérateur évoque « un problème de sécurité »
item.description: Il y a deux jours, Orange expliquait que valider une mise à jour prenait du temps. Aujourd'hui, après une fronde massive sur les forums et les réseaux, l'opérateur déploie soudainement la dernière version d'HyperOS sur les Xiaomi 15.

item.title: Ces extensions ont transformé mon expérience de Steam
item.description: Plusieurs extensions pour navigateur permettent de radicalement améliorer l'expérience de Steam et profiter des meilleurs prix.

item.title: Quatix 8 Pro : Garmin dévoile une nouvelle montre avec connexion satellite, mais bien plus utile encore
item.description: Après ses Fenix 8 Pro et Fenix 8 Pro Microled lancées l'an dernier, Garmin a déployé ses dernières technologies connectées vers un nouveau modèle, la Garmin Quatix 8 Pro, destinée aux navigateurs.

item.title: The Disney+ Hulu bundle is on sale for $10 for one month right now
item.description: You have the best chance to save on streaming services during the holiday shopping season, but throughout the year, the occasional deal pops up that's worth considering. Case in point: this new Disney+ deal. New and eligible returning subscribers can sign up for the Disney+ Hulu bundle (with ads) for $10 for one month of access. That's $3 off the usual price of the bundle for one month, and more than 58 percent off if you consider the cost of each service individually (Disney+ at $12 per month and, separately, Hulu also at $12 per month). We'd be remiss if we didn't mention that this isn't qui...

item.title: 1Password launches Unified Access as a one-stop shop for managing company credentials – say goodbye to shadow IT and SaaS sprawl
item.description: Forget about shadow IT and SaaS sprawl - 1Password's Unified Access platform can discover credentials for you and creates a secure, compliant platform to manage your applications.

item.title: Betterment confirms data breach, tells customers to beware crypto scam notifications
item.description: A Betterment employee was tricked into sharing login credentials, which were then used to send phishing emails.

item.title: De gros nuages noirs à l’horizon pour le marché du PC
item.description: Un petit miracle avant le saut dans le vide : c'est ainsi que l'on pourrait qualifier le quatrième trimestre 2025 pour les vendeurs de PC. Les livraisons ont augmenté de quasiment 10 % en fin d'année dernière selon IDC, mais 2026 s'annonce extrêmement compliquée.

item.title: The best 55-inch 4K TVs for all budgets, all tested by our experts.
item.description: Don't settle for less than the best 55-inch 4K TVs, with great pictures, upscaling, interfaces, and audio all in one brilliant package.

item.title: The Latest ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ Trailer Gives Us an Unlikely Team-Up
item.description: Wakanda welcomes a surprise guest in our latest look at the next 'Avengers' film.

item.title: Tesla launches a seven-seat version of the 2026 Model Y
item.description: Tesla's 2026 Model Y is now available on the company's site and it comes with a new (and old) option: a seven-seat version via a third row. The extra seating costs $2,500 and is only available if you order the Premium All-Wheel-Drive Long Range model. Tesla first teased the option last year via an email to prospective buyers with the promise of "seating for up to seven and enough room for everyone's gear," Electrek reported at the time. The new seats appear to be designed mainly for children as they don't offer much legroom, according to images on Tesla's configurator. Tesla notes that the s...

item.title: Google Messages is getting a big update in 2026 — here are the 3 new WhatsApp-style features to look out for
item.description: This is the year that Google Messages finally gets group chat mentions, and a more advanced long-press menu.

item.title: How Lego’s Smart Brick works
item.description: The most interesting story at this year's CES was just a little tiny bundle of technology. One way to look at Lego's new Smart Brick is as something like a Raspberry Pi, an endlessly remixable gizmo with infinite hacking potential - it can be anything, in the best possible way. Another way to look at […]

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : même les iPhone d’Apple sont en soldes dans cette sélection des 16 meilleures offres
item.description: Si vous attendiez les soldes pour changer de smartphones, vous avez bien fait ! Durant cette période, on trouve de belles offres du côté des Galaxy S de Samsung, des Pixel de Google et appareils Xiaomi, et même des iPhone d'Apple. Découvrez les meilleures offres : il y en a pour tous les budgets.

item.title: Quand baisser les graphismes vous rend plus fort : découvrez le concept fou de FPS Quest
item.description: Et si optimiser les performances d'un jeu avait un autre avantage que la fluidité ? FPS Quest promet d'indexer votre barre de vie avec votre fréquence d'images par seconde. Enfin, pas tout à fait.

item.title: L’offre à saisir des soldes, c’est ce pack Xiaomi 15T à prix cassé avec la Redmi Watch 5 Active offerte
item.description: Boulanger propose un pack très attractif réunissant le Xiaomi 15T et la Redmi Watch 5 Active pour seulement 499 euros au lieu de 699 euros. Une promotion idéale pour ceux qui veulent s’équiper sans faire exploser le budget pendant les soldes d'hiver 2026.

item.title: Star Wars Outlaws developer Massive Entertainment and Ubisoft Stockholm face layoffs
item.description: We aren't even two weeks into the new year and Ubisoft is already looking to carry out its second round of layoffs in 2026. The company has informed workers at Massive Entertainment and Ubisoft Stockholm of a "proposed organizational restructure" that could affect around 55 roles across its two Swedish studios. Workers at Massive (the developer of The Division series, Star Wars Outlaws and Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora) were offered voluntary buyouts late last year as part of Ubisoft's ongoing cost-cutting efforts."This restructure follows the completion of the Voluntary Leave Program launched ...

item.title: 'All those moments will be lost in time, like tears in rain' — Players bid farewell to Anthem as EA officially shuts down the game's servers for good
item.description: Anthem servers have officially gone offline, making BioWare's 2019 online sci-fi shooter no longer playable, leaving players to share their final farewells.

item.title: Why prediction markets may be bad for your wallet—and your mental health
item.description: The parallels to casinos are drastically obvious. Prediction markets are all the rage right now. Weekly trading volume on prediction platforms just surpassed $2 billion, and apps like Polymarket are being treated as the “next big thing” in consumer finance and entertainment. These platforms are designed to gamify uncertainty by exploiting the same cognitive biases as gambling and day-trading, quietly pushing users toward overspending, emotional volatility, and compulsive checking....

item.title: Zorin OS continue de séduire et passe le cap des 2 millions de téléchargements
item.description: Le système d’exploitation continue de profiter de la fin du support de Windows 10. La distribution Linux a été téléchargée plus de deux millions de fois en à peine trois mois.

item.title: U.S. consumer prices likely stayed high in December, as data recovers from shutdown
item.description: The 43-day government shutdown last fall blocked the collection of data used to compile the inflation rate. Inflation likely remained elevated last month as the cost of electricity, groceries, and clothing may have jumped and continued to pressure consumers’ wallets.The Labor Department is expected to report that consumer prices rose 2.6% in December compared with a year earlier, according to economists’ estimates compiled by data provider FactSet. The yearly rate would be down from 2.7% in November. Monthly prices, however, are expected to rise 0.3% in December, faster than is consistent wit...

item.title: Deepgram raises $130M at $1.3B valuation and buys a YC AI startup
item.description: Deepgram is raising its Series C round at a $1.3 billion valuation.

item.title: A Resident Evil showcase is taking place on January 15
item.description: Resident Evil Requiem, the first new mainline entry in the series since 2021’s Resident Evil Village, is just over a month away and Capcom is ready to share more details. The publisher will air a Resident Evil Showcase on January 15 at 5PM ET. You’ll be able to watch it on Twitch and YouTube (in English and Japanese).The stream will run for around 12 minutes. It will feature “all the latest info on Resident Evil Requiem,” which will almost certainly include some gameplay ahead of it hitting PS5, Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch 2 and Steam on February 27. Capcom might have more in store, thoug...

item.title: « Sweetpea », des écouteurs conçus par OpenAI et Jony Ive pour concurrencer les AirPods ?
item.description: OpenAI préparerait ses premiers écouteurs IA grand public, nom de code « Sweetpea », avec l’objectif affiché de rivaliser directement avec les AirPods d’Apple dès septembre 2026, selon plusieurs fuites concordantes qui restent toutefois à prendre avec les pincettes de rigueur.

item.title: AirTags are back on sale, with a four-pack going for $65
item.description:
Most Apple products are pretty expensive, but some of the most affordable (and useful) ones are AirTags. The Bluetooth trackers are priced pretty reasonably even when not on sale, but they can be a steal if you can get them on a discount — like right now. A four pack of AirTags is on sale for $65 at Amazon, which is only a few dollars more than the record-low price we saw during Black Friday this year.
AirTags can be useful for people who travel frequently, helping you to keep track of essentials like your passport as well as a way to keep tabs on luggage while you're on the go. If you do pu...

item.title: Camouflage EZ BirdFeed review: a superb value, smart bird feeder camera that identifies your feathered friends
item.description: An affordable and robust bird feeder camera with built-in solar panels, but slightly let down by picture quality and file management.

item.title: Counter-Strike 1.6 s’offre une version VR inattendue, voici à quoi ça ressemble
item.description: Un portage VR de Counter-Strike 1.6 vous permet de relancer l'un des FPS par lequel tout a commencé pour des millions de joueurs. À condition de posséder un casque de réalité virtuelle.

item.title: Brace yourself, Resident Evil fans: Capcom announces a 12-minute Resident Evil Showcase, and there are four big potential surprises I'm hoping for
item.description: Resident Evil fans have waited long enough, and Capcom has finally announced a Resident Evil Showcase, and it may be time for a Requiem demo.

item.title: 1,058 miles without stopping –the world's longest-range SUV just landed in China, and Tesla should be worried
item.description: Xpeng says its latest hybrid G7 boasts the longest combined range of any SUV in the world.

item.title: 5 biggest fails that got a company or product a disparaging nickname from consumers – starting with the newcomer 'Microslop'
item.description: Microslop is a fresh nickname for Microsoft coined by those who feel the company is pushing AI too hard – but will it stick?

item.title: Elijah Wood Says More ‘Lord of the Rings’ Movies Are Coming, Just Don’t Ask Him if He’s in Them
item.description: However, the once and forever Frodo admits he's very excited about Andy Serkis' 'The Hunt for Gollum.'

item.title: Insta360 releases AI-powered follow-up to its Link webcams
item.description: Insta360, a company most known for its action cameras, has released two new AI-powered 4K webcams, the Link 2 Pro and Link 2C Pro, aimed at creators, educators and remote professionals. The company's goal with these models is "a webcam experience that looks and sounds remarkably close to a professional camera and microphone setup." Both models use a larger 1/1.3-inch sensor with dual native ISO for improved low-light performance over the previous generation, and both support HDR. Insta360 says the audio on both models leverages beamforming technology as well as AI noise canceling to help voice...

item.title: Urevo SpaceWalk 5L Walking Pad Review: Compact and Affordable
item.description: Urevo’s affordable new walking pad is cheaper than a round-trip ticket to hike in Iceland.

item.title: Insta360’s face-tracking webcams get bigger sensors and more expensive
item.description: Insta360 has announced new Pro versions of its Link 2 and Link 2C webcams that first launched in September 2024. As with the previous versions, the new Link 2 Pro and 2C Pro can track the movements of onscreen subjects to ensure they're always in frame, making them ideal for those presenting on a video […]

item.title: Slackbot is an AI agent now
item.description: Salesforce unveils Slackbot, a new AI agent that allows users to complete tasks across multiple enterprise applications from Slack.

item.title: Japanese hi-fi great Marantz has a new high-end AV system — ready for Dolby Atmos, DTS:X and 4K 120Hz
item.description: Marantz' new preamp and amp are made for serious home theater –and are less expansive than its last AV beasts

item.title: "Slackbot isn’t just another copilot or AI assistant - it’s the front door to the Agentic Enterprise" - Salesforce's new superpowered AI is now open to all
item.description: Salesforce unleashes its Slackbot AI tool into the world - here's what it can do for you.

item.title: Slack’s automated bot is getting an upgrade into an AI workplace helper
item.description: The company envisions Slackbot as a personalized work agent for getting things done and synthesizing institutional wisdom. If you’re a Slack user, you’re probably familiar with Slackbot as a good-natured—if annoying—assistant that delivers notifications, reminders, and keyword-based automatic responses within the workplace chat app. But for organizations with paid Slack plans that have AI features enabled, Slackbot is receiving a bit of a brain transplant. The company has rebuilt the humble bot as an AI agent that can help bring you up to speed on workplace discussions and priorities, pull ...

item.title: Fanatics goes all-in on entertainment
item.description: Fanatics Studios, a collaboration with OBB Media, adds content to the company’s sports retail, collectibles, and gaming empire. The convergence of brand work and entertainment is set to be making significant leaps and bounds this year as a result in a flurry of activity in 2025. Large brands of consequence have made serious investment in in-house entertainment studios over the past few years—LVMH, AB InBev, Nike, and Dick’s Sporting Goods, among them. Now, sports retail and gaming giant Fanatics is partnering with OBB Media to launch Fanatics Studios. ...

item.title: En 2026, l’espace se tourne vers deux priorités claires : la Terre et la Lune
item.description: L'année 2026 comptera de nombreuses nouvelles missions spatiales, principalement à destination de la Lune et dédiées à l’observation de la Terre. Quatre à destination de la Lune pour le compte de la Nasa sont prévues pour apporter des avancées technologiques importantes et mettre en œuvre des...

item.title: Grok et deepfakes : pour la France, la stratégie d’Elon Musk est « complètement hypocrite »
item.description: L'ambassadrice de la France pour l'intelligence artificielle, Clara Chappaz, ne décolère pas. Rendre payante la génération d'images sur Grok après le scandale des deepfakes est une réponse « cynique » qui permet à X de monétiser les abus.

item.title: The Dreame L50 Ultra robot vacuum and mop has never been cheaper — save over $500 at Amazon
item.description: As of Jan. 13, the Dreame L50 Ultra robot vacuum and mop has dropped to $849.98 at Amazon, 39% off its list price of $1,399.99.

item.title: New ruling in Rockstar Games legal battle means the GTA 6 studio won't be forced to pay fired employees interim relief — 'We regret that we were put in a position where dismissals were necessary'
item.description: A judge has officially ruled that Rockstar Games won't be forced to pay interim relief to the 34 Grand Theft Auto 6 developers it fired in October, after the IWGB accused the studio of union-busting.

item.title: WhatsApp planche sur un système de contrôle parental
item.description: Les équipes de Meta veulent aider les parents à protéger au mieux les échanges de leurs enfants.

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel answers Stephen Colberts quickfire questions, gets surprisingly deep
item.description: Jimmy Kimmel appeared on "The Late Show" and took Stephen Colbert's "questionert".

item.title: PC shipments just grew unexpectedly amid RAM shortages
item.description: The PC market is bracing for a turbulent year ahead, but shipments managed to exceed expectations in the recent holiday quarter. IDC reports that shipments grew nearly 10 percent year-over-year in the fourth quarter of 2025, reaching 76.4 million in total. Microsoft's end of Windows 10 support undoubtedly helped push PC shipments up, but IDC […]
